name: Harper
text: I just wanted you to come home early for once.

actions.actionText: I can try harder next time.

text: Why won’t you listen to how I’m feeling?

actions.actionText: I want to, but I can’t always make you happy.
You are getting way too worked up.

text: It seems like you care more about your job than me.

actions.actionText: I’m losing sleep over this argument.
I do a lot for you too, you know.

text: Just tell me the truth and I promise I won’t get mad, okay?

actions.actionText: I really do care about you.
You make me feel like I’m always doing something wrong.

text: Do you even still like me?

actions.actionText: I’ll do better to be here for you.
You act as if I abandoned you for someone else.

text: We were supposed to have our couple’s night tonight.

actions.actionText: I’ll do better to be here for you.
